pubmed:
(bias[MeSH Terms] OR bias*[tiab] OR fairness[tiab] OR disparit*[tiab] OR equity[tiab] ) AND (healthcare[tiab] OR health-care[tiab] OR
medical*[tiab] OR medicine*[tiab] OR clinical*[tiab] OR health*[tiab]) AND ("Natural Language Processing"[Mesh] OR LLM[tiab] OR LLMs[tiab]
OR language model*[tiab] OR BERT[tiab] OR GPT-*[tiab] OR
ChatGPT*[tiab] OR OpenAI*[tiab] OR Flair[tiab] OR Llama*[tiab] OR
ClinicalBERT[tiab] OR BioClinicalBERT[tiab] OR PubMedBERT[tiab] OR
Ernie*[tiab] OR Claude*[tiab] OR Gemini*[tiab] OR Mixtral*[tiab] OR
DeepSeek*[tiab] ) AND ("English"[LA]) NOT (Review[Publication Type])
NOT (Systematic Review[Publication Type]) NOT (MetaAnalysis[Publication Type]) AND (2018:2025[pdat])
scopus:
TITLE-ABS((bias* OR fairness OR disparit* OR equity) AND (healthcare*
OR “health-care*” OR medical* OR medicine* OR clinical* OR health*)
AND ("Natural Language Processing" OR LLM OR LLMs OR “language
model*” OR BERT OR “GPT*” OR ChatGPT* OR OpenAI* OR Flair OR
Llama* OR ClinicalBERT OR BioClinicalBERT OR PubMedBERT OR Ernie*
OR Claude* OR Gemini* OR Mixtral* OR DeepSeek* ) ) AND PUBYEAR >
2016 AND PUBYEAR < 2026 AND ( LIMIT-TO ( DOCTYPE,"ar" ) OR LIMITTO ( DOCTYPE,"cp" ) ) AND ( LIMIT-TO ( LANGUAGE,"English" ) )
